Coireanna a aicmiú i gcúiseanna coiriúla
The way in which a criminal offence is investigated and prosecuted depends on the type of crime involved
Déantar imscrúdú ar chion coiriúil agus déantar é a ionchúiseamh bunaithe ar an gcineál coire atá i gceist
For these purposes criminal offences may be described in different ways
Chun na críche seo, féadtar cionta coiriúla a aicmiú i slite difriúla
The law on public order offences is mainly set down in the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act, 1994
Tá an chuid is mó den dlí a bhaineann le cionta oird phoiblí leagtha amach san Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994
Find out more about the different types of offences
Faigh amach níos mó faoi na cineálacha difriúla cionta
In Ireland the Misuse of Drugs Act 1977 as amended by other legislation is the principal legislation that covers drug offences and the respective penalties
In Éirinn is é an tAcht um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí 1977, arna leasú le reachtaíocht eile, an phríomhreachtaíocht a bhaineann le cionta drugaí agus leis na pionóis faoi seach
Alcohol and the law
Alcól agus an dlí
Laws in place regarding the serving of alcohol on licensed premises and off-licences, drinking in public and drink driving
Pléann an cháipéis seo an dlí maidir le alcól a dhíol in áitribh chéadúnaithe agus siopaí eischeadúnais, ól in áiteanna poiblí agus tiomáint faoi thionchar alcóil
Drink driving is a very serious offence
Cion an-tromchúiseach is ea an tiomáint ar meisce
